Question
========
Which statement best describes Quarto?

Answerlist
----------
* An open-source publishing system that combines text and code to create formatted output
* A web browser extension for viewing PDFs
* A spreadsheet program for data entry
* A CSS framework for web styling

Solution
========
Quarto is a publishing system that integrates narrative text and executable code to produce output documents.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
